title: Never, ever give up
description: In the pitch-black night, stung by jellyfish, choking on salt water, singing to herself, hallucinating … Diana Nyad just kept on swimming. And that's how she finally achieved her lifetime goal as an athlete: an extreme 100-mile swim from Cuba to Florida -- at age 64. Hear her story.
author: Diana Nyad
keywords: TED, talks, aging, culture, extreme sports, goal-setting
